characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: The first time this unit is set up, roll a D6 and apply the following result. On a 1, remove D6 models in the unit as they are slain when their mutations run amok. On a 2-3, add 2" to the unit's Move characteristic for the duration of the battle. On a 3-4, add 1 to the unit's Attack characteristic in a turn in which it has charged. On a 5-6, add 1 to the unit's Toughness.
